chart.searchString: host=gw | eval du=mvindex(split(mvindex(split(mvindex(split(urldecode(du),"?"),0),"#"),0),".com"),1) | eventstats count as totalPageViews by du | eventstats avg(totalPageViews) as avgTotalPageViews | stats first(du) as bouncePage last(du) as entryPage, first(totalPageViews) as totalPageViews, first(avgTotalPageViews) as avgTotalPageViews by vi, du | stats count as bounceCount, first(totalPageViews) as totalPageViews, first(avgTotalPageViews) as avgTotalPageViews by bouncePage | eval bounceRate=round((bounceCount/totalPageViews)*100,2) | where totalPageViews > avgTotalPageViews*.25 | sort -bounceRate | search NOT du="order-confirmation.ep" | table bouncePage bounceCount bounceRate | sort -bounceRate

table.title: User Stats
table.searchString: host=gw | eval du=mvindex(split(mvindex(split(mvindex(split(urldecode(du),"?"),0),"#"),0),".com"),1) | eventstats count as views| eventstats dc(cs) as visits | eventstats dc(cs) as vv by vi | stats first(views) as views, avg(vv) as vv, first(visits) as visits, count(du) as pageCount by vi | stats first(views) as views, first(visits) as visits, dc(vi) as uniqueVisits, avg(pageCount) as "avg pages/visit", first(vv) as "avg visits/visitor" | transpose | rename column as type, "row 1" as count

table.title: Top Entry Pages
table.searchString: host=gw | eval du=mvindex(split(mvindex(split(mvindex(split(urldecode(du),"?"),0),"#"),0),".com"),1) | eventstats count as totalPageViews by du | eventstats avg(totalPageViews) as avgTotalPageViews | stats first(du) as bouncePage last(du) as entryPage, first(totalPageViews) as totalPageViews, first(avgTotalPageViews) as avgTotalPageViews by vi, du | stats count as bounceCount, first(totalPageViews) as totalPageViews, first(avgTotalPageViews) as avgTotalPageViews by entryPage | top entryPage by totalPageViews | sort -totalPageViews | table totalPageViews, entryPage
